item.title: Shares in Asia advance, led by tech stocks, after another week of gains for Wall St
item.description: Shares are mostly higher in Asia after gains for Amazon carried the U.S. stock market to the finish of another winning week and month

item.title: ‘Regretting You’ and ‘Black Phone 2’ neck-in-neck on slow Halloween box office weekend
item.description: The movie exhibition business is wrapping up one of its slowest Octobers in over 25 years with a sluggish Halloween weekend
